scripts.build:pages: chmod +x scripts/create-index.sh && npm run build:swagger && scripts/create-index.sh
scripts.generate:axios: NPM_NAME=pets && TARGET_DIR=typescript-axios-src && rimraf ${TARGET_DIR} && npm run build:swagger && openapi-generator-cli generate -g typescript-axios -i build/openapi.yml -o ${TARGET_DIR}  --additional-properties=npmName=${NPM_NAME}
